description: jQuery manipulation module implementing DOM cloning, element insertion, removal, and data management functions.

methods.name: manipulationTarget
methods.description: Determines the appropriate target element for DOM manipulation, especially for tables.

methods.name: disableScript
methods.description: Temporarily disables script elements for safe DOM manipulation.

methods.name: restoreScript
methods.description: Restores script elements to their original state after manipulation.

methods.name: setGlobalEval
methods.description: Marks scripts as already evaluated to prevent re-execution.

methods.name: cloneCopyEvent
methods.description: Copies event handlers and private data from source to cloned elements.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all descendant elements of a given node, optionally filtered by tag.

methods.name: fixInput
methods.description: Fixes issues with cloned input elements, preserving checked state and default values.
